item.title: I Will Fly

item.title: Leaving Home
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|Wasn’t it a tranquil place I left?]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|I am trustful.]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|For nothing I can grip with my hands,]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|But for a new chance.

item.title: Welcome to the World
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/people_live_here.md#these-storms-are-getting-stronger-now-vyl-wnanory|We are born into a world,]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/people_live_here.md#these-storms-are-getting-stronger-now-vyl-wnanory|Where intelligence is slaved to money]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/people_live_here.md#these-storms-are-getting-stronger-now-vyl-wnanory|We’ve accepted our thoughtlessness]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/people_live_here.md#these-storms-are-getting-stronger-now-vyl-wnanory|Not to see our imperfection]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/people_live_here.
